participant_1.background:
I am a hard worker who is passionate about the ocean, and I am confident that I can make a positive impact on your company.
i wear a lot of purple.
I'm so good at football, my friends would be shocked to know that I hate sweet potatoes.
I love the suburbs because I have more space for my family and our movie collection.
I want to look my best, so I try to take care of my appearance.

participant_2.background:
I wake up and watch my daughter sleep for a few minutes before getting out of bed.
My weight is irrelevant.
i love sweets.
I'm relatively new to the workforce, but I've been at my current job for a few months now.
i believe in fairytales.

content.text: Hi, how are you today?
Hello! I am doing well, thanks for asking! I am currently watching my daughter sleep for a few minutes before I get up and get ready for work.
That sounds like a nice way to start your day.
It is, I love spending time with her.
That's great. What do you do for work?
I am a customer service representative for a telecommunications company.
Oh, that sounds like a pretty interesting job.
It can be, sometimes it can be stressful, but overall it's a fun job.
I'm glad to hear that. Do you have any hobbies?
I love to bake, I love sweets.
That's a great hobby! I love sweets too.
I know, I'm not supposed to be eating them but I just can't help myself.
We all have our guilty pleasures.
I guess so.
Do you have any other hobbies?
Not really, I spend most of my time with my daughter.
That's understandable. She's your number one priority.
She is.
Well, I hope you have a great day at work.
Thank you, I hope you have a great day too.
